techmeme.title: The UK's NCA shuts down Russian Coms, a caller ID spoofing platform used by hundreds of criminals to make 1.8M+ scam calls in 107 countries since 2021 (Sergiu Gatlan/BleepingComputer)
An Indian tribunal orders a halt on insolvency proceedings against Byju's, days after Byju's settled a $19M payments dispute case with the Indian cricket board (Arpan Chaturvedi/Reuters)
A profile of, and interview with, former OpenAI board member Helen Toner, who is building a reputation in Washington, DC, as a trusted expert on AI (Shirin Ghaffary/Bloomberg)
Stability AI announces Stable Fast 3D, a generative AI model for rapid 3D asset generation, says it can generate a 3D asset from a single image in 0.5 seconds (Sean Michael Kerner/VentureBeat)
Zomato's stock rose as much as 19% on August 2 after it reported Q1 profits up 125x to $30.2M, vs. ~$238K a year ago; Zomato's shares gained 110% in 2024 (Hritam Mukherjee/Reuters)
